headlines.text: Senior CRM & Lifecycle Marketing Leader | Email & SMS Strategy | Customer Retention
Senior CRM Marketing Leader | Revenue Growth | Team Leadership | Retention Expert

professionalSummaries.text: Senior CRM marketing leader with 8+ years of experience driving revenue, customer retention, and engagement across e-commerce, subscription, and multi-channel consumer brands. Proven track record of managing large-scale CRM programs, advanced segmentation, cross-channel orchestration (email, SMS, push, in-app messaging), and leading high-performing teams. Adept at leveraging data, analytics, and marketing technology to deliver measurable improvements in conversion, loyalty, and customer lifetime value.

keyAccomplishments.text: Led aggressive SMS channel expansion (+44% YTD opt-ins) and shifted SMS to 37% of total CRM revenue (+42% YoY) by focusing on early-lifecycle engagement
Owned full CRM & retention programs that drove 62% of total company revenue at a DTC subscription brand through behavior-driven repeat purchase initiatives and personalized lifecycle journeys
Reduced churn by 12% and improved LTV through data-driven cohort analysis, targeted customer journeys, and personalized retention strategies across high-value segments
Evolved loyalty program at QDOBA, growing membership by 58% through advanced segmentation, retention-focused campaigns, and churn analytics, driving incremental revenue and LTV uplift
Served as cross-functional leader on platform migrations and retention roadmap prioritization with Brand, Product, CX, Merchandising, and Analytics teams
Led and developed two direct reports, improving team performance and career progression
keyAccomplishments.linkedToRole: Hanna Andersson Manager, Email & SMS Marketing

bullets.text: Led aggressive SMS channel expansion as key stakeholder in full ESP and SMS vendor platform migration; implemented new list-growth tactics and advanced segmentation to protect churn, achieving +44% YTD SMS list growth and shifting SMS contribution from 26% to 37% of total CRM revenue (+42% YoY).
Owned comprehensive CRM testing/personalization roadmap, including implementing send-time optimization, increasing email engagement +5%.
Implemented retention-focused journeys that reduced churn across high-value segments and strengthened long-term customer engagement.
Owned CRM day-to-day strategy and execution, driving full-year comp actualization to +8.6% while navigating a complex marketing tech stack and advancing segmentation.
Progressed as new people manager; led team to strong results, navigated performance challenges, and improved reporting/actionable insights from data.
Drove 62% of total company revenue through full ownership of CRM programs, including email, SMS, and retention marketing.
Reduced churn by 12% through personalized lifecycle touchpoints and targeted retention offers.
Increased loyalty membership by 58% through targeted retention and acquisition strategies.
